text.text_translated: The sun was bright, so Sam closed his eyes a little. He looked at a car far away. The car made dust go up into the air. It went to the Big House. The horses moved their tails. They did not care about their owner. This was his first visit in ten months. Sam waited. Mr Carter was his boss. Mr Carter only came here when it was important. This was good for Sam. He knew he must stay away from his boss to keep his job. Mr Carter was hot. He cleaned the sweat from his neck. His shirt was wet in some parts. The wet parts looked like maps. His skin was getting red in the June sun. But his skin showed he did not work outside. He was a rich man. He worked inside while other people did the hard work.

best_attempt.text_translated:
The sun was bright. Sam closed his eyes a little. He looked at a car far away. The car made the dirt go up into the air. It was going to the Big House.

The horses moved their tails. They did not care about their owner. This was his first visit in ten months.

Sam waited. Mr Carter was his boss. Mr Carter only came here when it was important. Sam was happy about this. He knew he could keep his job if he stayed away from his boss.

Mr Carter was hot. He cleaned the sweat from his neck. His shirt was wet in some parts. The wet parts looked like maps. His skin was getting red in the June sun. But his skin was not dark. He was a man with money. Other people did the work for him.
